\textbf{엔진 크기와 연비의 관계}\\
\end{Large}
\begin{normalsize}
3-step framework, ggplot()을 활용한 시각화 
\end{normalsize}
\end{center}

```{r include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

**Code**

```{r echo=TRUE}
hw05_plot <- 
  ggplot(data = mpg, mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color=class)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(aes(linetype = class), se = FALSE, show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(title = "Graph about Engine Size & Fuel Efficiency", # title
       subtitle = "Comparison by Car Model",         # subtitle
       x = "Engine Size",                            # x-axis label
       y = "Fuel Efficiency",                        # y-axis label
       color = "Car Model") +                        # legend title
  theme(legend.position = "top") +                   # legend position
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),      # title position
        plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = 0.5))+  # subtitle position
  guides(color = guide_legend(nrow = 1))             # legend in one row
```

```{r include=FALSE}
ggsave("hw05_plot.png")
```
